Name: Chimayo
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of red apple slice.
Review: I used to make this cocktail with reposado tequila, but it's cleaner and better with blanco tequila. Either way, cassis and apple juice mellow tequila.
History: Named after El Potrero de Chimayo in northern New Mexico, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Chimayo contains 163 calories
